text.tspan: Let the difference in the angle between two edges A and B be ß.
We wish to offsets these edges (offset distance = δ), and bevel
these offset edges where they join such that this bevel is exactly
δ units from the vertex (a) where the original edges joined.
Given that point b is easily derived from prior calculations of
edge unit normals, and that offsetting b in the direction of e
is also easily performed using pre-calculated edge unit vectors,
we need to calculate how far c will be from b.
and given both triangles share a common hypotenuse...
